title: vINE azhiyAdE
sahitya:
vINE azhiyAdE nenjE
 


caraNam 1    UNuDal vAzhvuyirkkellAm svantam uyarvu thAzhvu mudalAm prati bandham
UnakkEn unvinaippiravi anantam unnai nI uNarndu pAr tIrum bandham
  caraNam 2    vanja vaim-pAdakam vinaivikkum vittu mAyap-poruLAshai Or perum pittu
mAnam azhikkum nidamum Abattu mAnilamEl peNgaL Ashai piDittu
 
 caraNam 3   shinam AhankAram kAmattai kollu tiruvaruL vazhiyai aDaikkum kallu
manamaDangum sannidhiyilE nillu vAi maNakkum aiyan pErai nI shollu
